definition: the Last Supper (in the biblical Passion story)
the Last Supper (in the Christian Passion story)

sentences.english: Allow at least three hours between dinner and bedtime.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐和睡覺之間至少允許有三個小時。

sentences.english: They were given nothing other than dry bread and water for their evening meal.
sentences.chinese: 他們只得到了乾麪包和水作晚餐。

sentences.english: After the waitress arrived with our food, we ate in silence for a time.
sentences.chinese: 女招待端來了我們的晚餐，我們默默地吃了一會兒。

sentences.english: Then you come home and cook up the legs for dinner because they are considered a delicacy.
sentences.chinese: 然後你回到家煮蛙腿當晚餐，因爲它們是非常美味的。

sentences.english: Families and communities share the happiness of gathering together for iftar and prayers.
sentences.chinese: 親朋好友歡聚一堂，共享齋月晚餐並共同祈禱。

sentences.english: After dinner, the table is cleared and moved outside and mattresses laid down.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐後矮桌清理乾淨並移到外面，地上鋪上了牀墊。

sentences.english: I'd like a candlelight dinner, some dancing and to talk about our future.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一個燭光晚餐，跳跳舞，談談我們的未來。

sentences.english: I want to thank Tom and the Chamber and all of the sponsors for hosting this dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我要感謝湯姆和美國商會以及晚餐會的所有主辦方。

sentences.english: When you can, try to eat dinners at home.
sentences.chinese: 當您可以，嘗試在家裏喫晚餐。

sentences.english: He likes to eat duck for dinner.
Youll have to make do with cold meat for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐你只好將就一下用冷肉了。

sentences.english: Mr. Mammen: Yes, my wife and family are here for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我的妻子和家人想在這裏喫晚餐。

sentences.english: We also had dinner in Xiangbin's private Diaojiao house. Wine was the Yao men's favorite drink all along.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐在吊腳樓裏舉行，酒是瑤家漢子的最愛。
我要弄紅膾牛肉作晚餐。

sentences.english: Today's dinner is my husband cooks first time.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的晚餐是我丈夫初次掌廚的成果。

definition: afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)
